title: Sony Xperia Media Player Font
content:
Xperia uses Roboto for home page, but in apps it uses something else. Any clues.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150405123154im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Screenshot_2014-06-12-12-22-09_3574.png)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150405123154im_/http:/typophile.com/files/TypeSample_6505.jpg)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150405123154im_/http:/typophile.com/files/TypeSample_6505.jpg)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150405123154im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Screenshot_2014-06-12-12-20-28_3706.png)

Font: 

 SST 

Solved By: 

 [Ryuk](http://web.archive.org/web/20150405123154/http:/typophile.com/user/22675 "View user profile.")
author: smallprint

comments.content: Could be [SST](http://web.archive.org/web/20150405123154/http:/www.sony.net/SonyInfo/design/works/projects/sst-font), SONY exclusive typeface designed by Monotype and SONY.
